ComicInfo.Characters: The Watchguard [Johnny Zip,Betty Jones,The Artificial Man,Mid-Nite Hour,The Proud American],Quinn Rey
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:19:58 [Issue ID 4000-104635] urn:comicvine:4000-104635 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 04:37:48. [Issue ID 233546]
ComicInfo.Summary: 1944. In the waning days of World War II, at the dawn of the nuclear age, super-powered beings are beginning to emerge from the shadows of conflict, beginning with the arrival of the Artificial Man. The United States government has a plan to turn these new arrivals into heroes. But someone forgot to tell the heroes the plan.Officially dubbed "Watchguard," the group makes its debut before the media, and a new (and not so welcome) member immediately appears. On the team's first mission, the Mid-Nite Hour begins to realize something isn't right, as some members barely participate and others get more than a little carried away in the heat of the moment. Passions begin to flare, animosity rears its head and violence erupts. They've only just begun. Is the end already in sight?
ComicInfo.Title: Battle Hymn Book Two: The Milk Run
